title: Test Failures on Main Branch - 2025-10-05 05:38:58
body:
TESTER detected test failures:

## Failed Tests
No automated test suite found in repository.

## Error Output
No test framework detected. Searched for:
- Python/pytest: pytest.ini, conftest.py, tests/test_*.py
- Node.js/Jest: package.json with test script
- Generic: Makefile, test scripts

None found.

## Suspected Cause
This repository appears to be a static HTML project (Avengers Archive) with no automated testing infrastructure configured. The project contains:
- index.html (basic HTML structure)
- CSS/JS/assets directories
- Python utility scripts (audit, label management)
- No test files or test configuration

## Suggested Fix
1. Determine if automated testing is needed for this project
2. For static HTML: Consider adding HTML validation tests, link checking, or accessibility tests
3. For Python scripts: Add pytest framework with test coverage for utility scripts
4. For JavaScript: Add Jest/Vitest for any interactive components
5. Create test directory structure and initial test cases
6. Add test runner to CI/CD pipeline if applicable
